message.raw: 1. modify xslt to replace all instance of atlas_description with atlas (or atlas_v3) when generating standalone gazebo models. 2. install standalone models in /share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models/.  As opposed to being nested inside atlas_description.
message.html: 1. modify xslt to replace all instance of atlas_description with atlas (or atlas_v3) when generating standalone gazebo models. 2. install standalone models in /share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models/. As opposed to being nested inside atlas_description.
